module.name: TTError
module.short: Simple error management for the FreeType library

The Pascal version of the library doesn't support multiple threads. We use a global error variable, called simply "error" to report all defects. The various functions return an error condition, which can be either Success (false) or Failure (true).
Note that the use of macros in the C version to automate error reporting makes the two source trees very similar, even if they differ from some design points like this one.
